explains: adj. 惊呆的；目瞪口呆的
v. 使石化；变僵硬；发呆（petrify 的过去分词）
wordGroup: petrified wood 木化石，硅化木

sentences.en: I've always been petrified of being alone.
The old lady stood petrified with astonishment, peering over her glasses; Tom lay on the floor expiring with laughter.
sentences.cn: 老太太站在那儿吓呆了，目光越过眼镜向外瞪着；汤姆却躺在地板上笑得喘不上气。
